verses.verse: Now shalt thou gather<WH1413> thyself in troops<WH1416>, O daughter<WH1323> of troops<WH1416>: he hath laid<WH7760> siege<WH4692> against us<WH5221>; they shall smite the judge<WH8199> of Israel<WH3478> with a rod<WH7626> upon the cheek<WH3895>.

But thou<WH1035>, Beth-lehem Ephrathah<WH672>, which art little<WH6810> to be among the thousands<WH505> of Judah<WH3063>, out of thee shall one come forth<WH3318> unto me that is to be ruler<WH4910> in Israel<WH3478>; whose goings forth<WH4163> are from of old<WH6924>, from everlasting<WH3117>.

Therefore will he give them up<WH5414>, until the time<WH6256> that she who travaileth<WH3205> hath brought forth<WH3205>: then the residue<WH3499> of his brethren<WH251> shall return<WH7725> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And he shall stand<WH5975>, and shall feed<WH7462> his flock in the strength<WH5797> of Jehovah<WH3068>, in the majesty<WH1347> of the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068> his God<WH430>: and they shall abide<WH3427>; for now shall he be great<WH1431> unto the ends<WH657> of the earth<WH776>.

And this man shall be our peace<WH7965>. When the Assyrian<WH804> shall come<WH935> into our land<WH776>, and when he shall tread<WH1869> in our palaces<WH759>, then shall we raise<WH6965> against him seven<WH7651> shepherds<WH7462>, and eight<WH8083> principal<WH5257> men<WH120>.

And they shall waste<WH7462> the land<WH776> of Assyria<WH804> with the sword<WH2719>, and the land<WH776> of Nimrod<WH5248> in the entrances<WH6607> thereof<WH5337>: and he shall deliver us from the Assyrian<WH804>, when he cometh<WH935> into our land<WH776>, and when he treadeth<WH1869> within our border<WH1366>.

And the remnant<WH7611> of Jacob<WH3290> shall be in the midst<WH7130> of many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971> as dew<WH2919> from Jehovah<WH3068>, as showers<WH7241> upon the grass<WH6212>, that tarry<WH6960> not for man<WH376>, nor wait<WH3176> for the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>.

And the remnant<WH7611> of Jacob<WH3290> shall be among the nations<WH1471>, in the midst<WH7130> of many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971>, as a lion<WH738> among the beasts<WH929> of the forest<WH3293>, as a young lion<WH3715> among the flocks<WH5739> of sheep<WH6629>; who<WH5674>, if he go through, treadeth down<WH7429> and teareth in pieces<WH2963>, and there is none to deliver<WH5337>.
Let thy hand<WH3027> be lifted up<WH7311> above thine adversaries<WH6862>, and let all thine enemies<WH341> be cut off<WH3772>.

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, that I will cut off<WH3772> thy horses<WH5483> out of the midst<WH7130> of thee<WH6>, and will destroy thy chariots<WH4818>:
and I will cut off<WH3772> the cities<WH6145> of thy land<WH776>, and will throw down<WH2040> all thy strongholds<WH4013>.
And I will cut off<WH3772> witchcrafts<WH3785> out of thy hand<WH3027>; and thou shalt have no more soothsayers<WH6049>:
and I will cut off<WH3772> thy graven images<WH6456> and thy pillars<WH4676> out of the midst<WH7130> of thee<WH7812>; and thou shalt no more worship the work<WH4639> of thy hands<WH3027>;
and I will pluck up<WH5428> thine Asherim<WH842> out of the midst<WH7130> of thee<WH8045>; and I will destroy thy cities<WH6145>.
And I will execute<WH6213> vengeance<WH5359> in anger<WH639> and wrath<WH2534> upon the nations<WH1471> which hearkened not<WH8085>.
